modules.description: The module offers configuration and customization operations for 2D/3D visualizations, working with numerical data matrices (`dsmat`) and plot handles to adjust titles, colors, scales, and output settings. It enables creation of diverse graphical representations, including line plots, histograms, heatmaps, and statistical charts like boxplots, with support for geometric shapes and surface/mesh plots. Use cases span data analysis, scientific visualization, and interactive plotting, leveraging parameterized styling for clarity and precision.

Generates 2D and 3D plots using data from Owl's numerical arrays, supporting line, scatter, and surface plots. Operates on dense matrices and vectors, enabling visualization of statistical distributions and model outputs. Used to inspect neural network activations and time-series data during model training.

Configures and customizes 2D and 3D visualizations using numerical data matrices and plot handles, supporting titles, colors, scales, and output settings. It generates line plots, histograms, heatmaps, boxplots, and surface plots, with tools for geometric shapes and parameterized styling. Operations include adjusting axes, adding annotations, and controlling rendering options. Examples include plotting time-series data with customized color schemes or visualizing matrix data as heatmaps with interactive controls.
